paper_title: Model Cascades for Efficient Image Search
abstract: Modern neural encoders offer unprecedented text-image retrieval (TIR) accuracy. However, their high computational cost impedes an adoption to large-scale image searches. We propose a novel image ranking algorithm that uses a cascade of increasingly powerful neural encoders to progressively filter images by how well they match a given text. Our algorithm reduces lifetime TIR costs by over 3x.
publication_venue: Under review as a short paper at the DEEM '23 workshop
